amendment.description: An amendment numbered 130 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit the use of funds for the National Labor Relations Board to implement, administer, or enforce the "Representation-Case Procedures" rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A072) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A072) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A072) Agreed to by voice vote.
